description: A detailed analysis of gene structure and expression in both prokaryotic and eukaryotic organisms. Rapid advances in DNA technology and genomics will be emphasized. The application of these advances to the molecular genetic analysis of development, cell function and disease will be discussed.
name: MOLEC GENETICS

values.comments:
Professor Weinberg received high praise across the board, even from students who had other concerns with the course. He was praised for a being an entertaining and passionate lecturer. Some students felt the lectures were somewhat hard to follow and that the course material could become overwhelming. Generally, the course and the professor were given high ratings. 
Note: Less than 25% of students submitted written evaluations for this class
